document_data.name: Khelvos Dermmen
document_data.mainbody: '''Khelvos Dermmen''' was the [[Provisional Governor]] of [[Scardale]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. His duties included leading the [[Scardale Council]] that ruled over the realm, both of which were stationed a keep in [[Chandlerscross]] looking over the [[Ashaba]].
document_data.Rulership: Khelvos was elected to replace [[Myrian Beechwood]] after the [[Shaking Plague]] devastated [[Scardale Town]] in [[1370 DR]].
